rule.name: Operation presence
rule.narrative: This rule detects the usage of the first version of Log4J.

threshold.message: Obsolete log4J version is used. Make sure to put in place a bridge to Log4J2 or SLF4J while waiting to migrate your code to Log4j2. You MUST link with a Log4J2 2.17.1+ version (Java 8) to protect your application from the CVE-2021-44228 vulnerability.
